name: Ugmania Together
description:
Ugmania is my survival game thats currently being updated, but its single player. So I made a multiplayer prototype using my limited networking skills. It sucks. It really sucks. Well have fun if you want. Also 'E' to throw snowballs.

HOW TO USE: theres a gui in the top left, HOSTS host game, CLIENTS join a game.

if you are playing over different internets then host has to port forward (log into router and port forward from there) and client needs to have the hosts IP (host just needs to search "what is my IP address")

If you are playing over same internet then host doesn't need to port forward. Client just needs to type "localHost" i think (UNTESTED).
